info.title: Price Simulation - Read
info.description: This inbound service enables you to simulate, and read the net price for a purchasing document, based on a pricing schema that is defined in the connected systems. It is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and other user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Read the simulated net price for a transaction based on a pricing schema that is defined in the connected systems in SAP S/4HANA Cloud

values.text: [Collaborative Manufacturing with SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud(1NX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NX " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Accept: application/json
